Sales / Client Relations Officer (Female) Job at Starzij Realtors




        
    

        
        Starzij Realtors is a real estate Investment advisory and asset management firm dedicated to helping investors and landlords make strategic, profitable, and data-driven property decisions. We specialize in acquisition support, portfolio optimization, rental analysis, and long-term asset performance.

We support clients across residential, commercial, and mixed-use assets ensuring every decision is backed by market intelligence, due diligence, and long-term value creation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales / Client Relations Officer (Female)

Job Location: Abuja

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are looking for a smart, driven and customer focused sales/client Relations officer to join our growing team. If you are passionate about real estate, love meeting people  and can close deals with confidence, this role is for you.


Responsibilities


	Manage the entire sales cycle from lead generation to deal closure and aftersales  followup.
	Schedule and conduct inspections
	Maintain accurate client records and manage CRM
	Liaise with landlords, developers and property owners
	Prepare offer letters, inspection forms,  and other documentation
	Develop and execute strategic sales plans to achieve sales targets 


Requirements


	Strong communication and negotiation skills
	Confident speaking with highnetworth clients
	A good understanding of Abuja real estate is an added advantage
	Ability to work under pressure and follow a structured sales process
	Previous sales experience (real estate or high ticket sales preferred).


Compensation


	N150,000 - N200,000 / Month
	Attractive commissions on closed deals
	Performance bonuses


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: starzijestate@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Include your instagram handle on your CV.

Assistant Marketing Manager Job at Key Retail Group




        
    

        
        Key Retail Group - From late-night supplier negotiations to overcoming Amazon compliance challenges, our journey has been nothing short of an adventure. We embrace the spirit of innovators and problem-solvers, but we also acknowledge the hard truths—supplier hiccups, shipping nightmares, and the occasional compliance curveball. Every great experiment has its failures, and we’ve had ours. But with an unwavering commitment to learning and growth, we dust ourselves off, recalibrate, and keep pushing forward. As a brand-building powerhouse, we thrive oncompetency, commitment, continuous learning, and teamwork—turning roadblocks into stepping stones. If you’ve made it this far, you probably already have an idea of what it takes to be one of us.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Marketing Manager

Job Location: Ojodu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Be the driving force behind marketing at Key Retail Group. As our Assistant Marketing Manager.
	You'll be central to shaping and elevating our brand on Amazon FBA, TikTok Shop, and Meta Shops (Facebook & Instagram), fusing strategic vision with hands-on action to drive our growth.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement multi-platform marketing strategies to build brand presence and boost sales.
	Lead the creation and execution of dynamic digital campaigns across social, paid, and owned channels.
	Coordinate closely with product, content, and creative teams to deliver unified marketing initiatives.
	Optimise SEO and manage PPC campaigns to increase visibility and drive qualified traffic.
	Monitor and analyse marketing metrics, campaign results, and trends to inform decisions.
	Identify and act on growth opportunities, aligning them with the company’s business objectives.
	Engage with and grow our online community, managing all major social media accounts.


Requirements


	B.Sc. in Marketing or any other related field.
	3-5 years of experience in digital marketing, preferably with e-commerce brands (Amazon FBA/TikTok/Meta Shops experience is a significant plus).
	Solid understanding of PPC advertising and paid social media marketing.
	Strong knowledge of SEO best practices and content marketing.
	Demonstrated ability to manage social media accounts and content calendars.
	Skilled in using ad platforms (Amazon, Meta, TikTok) and analytics tools (Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, Amazon Brand Analytics).
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills; ability to write blogs, product copy, and engaging posts.
	Analytical mindset and data-driven decision-making skills.
	Creativity and initiative in suggesting and implementing marketing ideas.
	Ability to multitask and manage various projects in a fast-paced environment.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: recruitment@keyretailgroup.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Executive Officer (Account) Job at Federal College of Education ((Technical)
content:
Federal College of Education Technical, Ekiadolor is a government owned College of Education located in Edo State, Southern part of Nigeria. The College was one of the government approved tertiary institutions in Nigeria by the Administration of President Buhari in 2019. The institution served as a Centre for training of School Teachers in Nigeria. The College of Education awards National Certificates in Education (NCE) to its graduates as it is a mandatory requirement for those who want to work as a teacher in a Nigerian school.

Applications are invited from suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Officer (Account)
     

            
    



Job Location: Benin-City, Edo
Department: Works 

Requirements
Candidate possessing any of the following with at least two (2) years of cognate
experience:


	National Diploma in Accountancy obtained from a recognized Institution of higher learning.
	A pass in Section I & II (Intermediate) NABTEB (Advance level) in two subjects obtained at one sitting or three subjects at two sitting preferably in economics, Accountancy or Mathematics.
	Intermediate Certificate of Chartered Secretaries and Administrators.


Salary
CONTEDISS 06.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit fifteen (15) typed written copies of their applications letters, Curriculum Vitae (CV) and attached photocopies of all relevant documents.

The CV should be arranged in the following order:


	Full names (surname first underlined)
	Date and place of birth
	State of Origin/Local Government Area
	Nationality
	Marital status
	Number and ages of children
	Current postal address including telephone numbers and e-mail address
	Educational Institutions attended with dates
	Academic/professional qualifications obtained with dates
	Membership of professional bodies/associations
	Previous employments with post held with dates
	Present employment indicating present status and salary.


All applications should be addressed to The Registrar, and submitted in sealed envelope to the address below:
The Registrar,
Federal College of Education (Technical) Ekiadolor,
P.M.B. 1206, Benin-City,
Edo State,
Nigeria.    

    

        Click here to Apply
